L2_gloss: to like people, to be a philanthropist

brother
Nibiri sanditi.My brother is sick.

name
Ka biri? ― What's your name?
Nibiri bei John. ― My name is John.

masculine definite article
Mutu le ― The man

nominalizing suffix deriving agent nouns of masculine gender (see -tu for feminine).
Arufudaha ― to teach
Arufudahati ― teacher
Ouchaha ― to fish
Ouchahati ― fisherman

feminine definite article
Mutu to ― The woman

nominalizing suffix deriving agent nouns of feminine gender (see -ti for masculine).
Abuwagu ― to cook
Abuwagutu ― chef (female)

with
Nabinaha tuma María. ― I'm going to dance with Mary.

and
Baruru tuma faluma ― Platains and coconuts
